Html:
I had a look through the buffs but Bone Shield http://www.wowhead.com/?spell=49222 is not included.

Am i Missing Something?

The buffs tab has *raid* buffs, or other buffs that can be on any generic player (with a couple exceptions).  Things like bone shield that belong only to one class and can only benefit the caster will be handled in each individual model via talents and/or rotations.  In this case, notice that as soon as you give yourself the "Bone Shield" talent your dps goes up, because it automatically assumes you use it if you have the talent.
